PopupManager
PopupManager

Handles GUI popups for errors, warnings, and messages.

Platform-specific implementation: Uses Windows native message boxes via ctypes, and tkinter on other systems.

Constructor Parameters
no_init_msg

If True, disables the initialization debug message.

Functions
_windows_messagebox
def _windows_messagebox(
self,
title
: 
str,
text
: 
str,
icon
: 
str
) -> None

Internal function to show a native Windows message box.

Parameters
title
str

Title of the popup.

text
str

Message body.

icon
str

One of "info", "warning", or "error".
